name: derby-select2
description: Native Derby JS replacement for jQuery Select2

scripts.build: export DEST=dist;export ASSETS='.*.scss|.*.html|./README.md|./package.json';find \( -path './node_modules*' -o -path "./$DEST" \) -prune -o -name '*.js' -print0| xargs -n1 -P8 -0 sh -c 'echo Compiling and minifying $0...;mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname $0`";`# babel --presets es2015 "$0" | uglifyjs - -cm -o "$DEST/$0"`;babel --presets es2015 "$0" > "$DEST/$0";';echo "[01;32mCopying assets...[00m";find \( -path './node_modules*' -o -path "./$DEST" \) -prune -o -regextype posix-egrep -regex $ASSETS -print0| xargs -n1 -0 sh -c 'mkdir -p "$DEST/`dirname "$0"`";cp -a "$0" "$DEST/$0"';echo "[01;32mDone![00m";
scripts.test: echo "TODO: no tests specified yet" && exit 1;
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean; npm run build;
